author: @KNOE8
title: Flood Warning issued January 2 at 7:32PM CST by NWS Little Rock AR
text:
Updated: 3 hours ago
A Northeast Louisiana business owner was allegedly scammed, according to the West Monroe Police Department.
Updated: 3 hours ago
Officials with LifeShare Blood Center in Monroe say they are on standby following the New Orleans terror attack on Wednesday, Jan. 1.
Updated: 4 hours ago
A World War II veteran in Monroe turned 100 years old on Thursday, Jan. 2 surrounded by family.
Updated: 4 hours ago
The Ike Hamilton Expo Center is getting set up for Resistol’s Stampede Rodeo which starts Friday, Jan. 3 at 7:30 p.m.
Updated: 23 hours ago
Local and regional officials reacted to the terror attack that killed 15 and injured dozens of New Year’s revelers on Bourbon Street early Wednesday, Jan. 1.
